attributes.action: Make all MP's act like adults instead of 9 year old's in the House of Commons
attributes.background: MP's are elected representives of the British taxpayer & they must act accordingly. Their behaviour in the House of Commons is deplorable. Measures must be put in place to ensure they behave like adults whilst discussing important issues that are effecting every person they are paid to represent.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. It is clear that this issue of MPs' behaviour concerns you, however your petition does not explain what action you would like to be taken to address this.

You might be interested in signing the following petitions on penalising MPs and for MPs to behave in a professional manner: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121149
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/111691

Or you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
